mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ITEM ( business_number, item_type, item_name, item_price, item_content, item_quantity, item_origin, item_expire_date, item_created_date ) VALUES ( #{businessNumber}, #{itemType}, 'FOOD', #{itemPrice}, #{itemContent}, #{itemQuantity}, #{itemOrigin}, #{itemExpireDate}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: -- 상품 목록 조회 SELECT i.item_number, i.business_number, i.item_type, i.item_name, i.item_price, i.item_content, i.item_quantity, i.item_origin, i.item_expire_date, -- s.store_name, im.item_image_system_name FROM TBL_ITEM i JOIN TBL_STORE s ON i.business_number = s.business_number LEFT JOIN TBL_ITEM_IMAGE im ON i.item_number = im.item_number WHERE i.business_number = #{businessNumber} ORDER BY i.item_number DESC
